00031   struct CpuInfo {
00032     CpuInfo &init();

00035     String model;

00043   struct CpuStat {
00044     CpuStat &refresh();
00045 
00046     // system wide cpu time in percentage
00047     double user;
00048     double sys;
00049     double nice;
00050     double idle;
00051     double wait;
00052     double irq;
00053     double soft_irq;
00054     double stolen;      // for virtualized env (Linux 2.6.11+)
00055     double total;
00056   };
00057 
00058   struct MemStat {
00059     MemStat &refresh();
00060 
00061     // memory usage in MB
00062     double ram;
00063     double total;
00064     double used;
00065     double free;
00066     double actual_used; // excluding kernel buffers/caches
00067     double actual_free; // including kernel buffers/caches
00068   };

00070   struct DiskStat {
00071     DiskStat &refresh(const char *dir_prefix = "/");
00072 
00073     String prefix;
00074     // aggregate io ops rate
00075     double reads_rate;
00076     double writes_rate;
00077 
00078     // aggreate transfer rate in MB/s
00079     double read_rate;
00080     double write_rate;
00081   };

00084     SwapStat &refresh();
00085

00087     double total;
00088     double used;
00089     double free;
00090 
00091     uint64_t page_in;

00104   struct NetStat {
00105     NetStat &refresh();
00106 
00107     int32_t tcp_established;
00108     int32_t tcp_listen;
00109     int32_t tcp_time_wait;
00110     int32_t tcp_close_wait;    // often indicating bugs
00111     int32_t tcp_idle;
00112 
00113     // transfer rate in KB/s
00114     double rx_rate;   // receiving rate only primary interface for now
00115     double tx_rate;   // transmitting rate...
00116   };

00119     OsInfo &init();
00120 
00121     String name;        // canonical system name
00122     String version;
00123     uint16_t version_major;
00124     uint16_t version_minor;
00125     uint16_t version_micro;
00126     String arch;
00127     String machine;     // more specific than arch (e.g. i686 vs i386)
00128     String description;
00129     String patch_level;
00130     String vendor;
00131     String vendor_version;

00147   struct ProcStat {
00148     ProcStat &refresh();
00149 
00150     // proc cpu time in ms
00151     uint64_t cpu_user;
00152     uint64_t cpu_sys;
00153     uint64_t cpu_total;
00154     double cpu_pct;
00155 
00156     // proc (virtual) memory usage in MB
00157     double vm_size;
00158     double vm_resident;
00159     double vm_share;
00160     uint64_t minor_faults;
00161     uint64_t major_faults;
00162     uint64_t page_faults;
00163   };

00165   struct FsStat {
00166     FsStat &refresh(const char *prefix = "/");
00167 
00168     // aggregate file system usage in GB
00169     String prefix;
00170     double total;
00171     double free;
00172     double used;
00173     double use_pct;
00174     double avail; // available to non-root users
00175 
00176     // aggregate files/inodes
00177     uint64_t files;
00178     uint64_t free_files; // free inodes
00179   };
